list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or their eyes) look carefully and thoroughly at (someone or something), especially so as to appraise them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her green eyes surveyed him coolly
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đôi mắt xanh của cô ấy khảo sát anh ấy lạnh lùng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: examine and record the area and features of (an area of land) so as to construct a map, plan, or description.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he surveyed the coasts of New Zealand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã khảo sát bờ biển New Zealand

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: investigate the opinions or experience of (a group of people) by asking them questions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: 95% of patients surveyed were satisfied with the health service

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a general view, examination, or description of someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the author provides a survey of the relevant literature
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tác giả cung cấp một cuộc khảo sát các tài liệu có liên quan

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of surveying an area of land.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the flight involved a detailed aerial survey of military bases
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chuyến bay liên quan đến một cuộc khảo sát trên không chi tiết về các căn cứ quân sự
